name: SUImageComparisonView
summary: An iOS View that let you swipe to reveal portions of two images like http://imgur.com/eyxNQM9
description:
An iOS View that let you swipe to reveal portions of two images like http://imgur.com/eyxNQM9 
  Features
    Support 2 UIImages
    The view contentMode property will be applied to the internal UIImageViews.
    Configurable initial slider position. Snappable left and right slider position (In case you want to slightly reveal the other image). 
    Configurable left and right image tint.
